sentences.en: a bird with conspicuous white markings
sentences.cn: 一种长有醒目白斑的鸟

sentences.en: Among the Grecian and Latin tribes these rites held a conspicuous position.
sentences.cn: 在希腊部落和拉丁部落中,这些宗教仪式占有突出的地位.

sentences.en: He could laugh good - naturedly, a little smugly , at whatever was conspicuous.
sentences.cn: 他看到任何标新立异的事, 总会一笑置之, 并无恶意.

sentences.en: He was conspicuous among his colleagues.
He was conspicuous for his bravery.
His eyes were now attracted by the most conspicuous feature of Lahaina.
sentences.cn: 拉哈伊纳最奇丽的景色慑住了他的心神.

sentences.en: I felt very conspicuous in my red coat.
sentences.cn: 我穿着红外套，感觉自己十分显眼。

sentences.en: It is conspicuous that smoking is harmful to health.
sentences.cn: 很明显,抽烟对健康有害.

sentences.en: Its colouring makes it highly conspicuous.
sentences.cn: 它的色彩使它非常惹人注目.

sentences.en: Morgan was the main attraction, the conspicuous personality here.
sentences.cn: 可是嫫干才是这儿的最惹眼的东西,最出众的人物.

sentences.en: Notices shall be put in conspicuous places.
sentences.cn: 要保证把布告贴在显眼的地方.
她是个引人注目的人物.

sentences.en: She's always conspicuous because of her fashionable clothes.
sentences.cn: 她总是穿着入时,引人注目.

sentences.en: The factory was too near the road, it was too conspicuous.
sentences.cn: 工厂离公路太近了, 太引人注意了.

sentences.en: The notice must be displayed in a conspicuous place.
sentences.cn: 通告一定要贴在显眼的地方。

sentences.en: The sympathetic nervous system plays a conspicuous role in regulating cardiovascular function.
sentences.cn: 交感神经系统对心血管机能调节起着突出作用.

sentences.en: You may feel tearful in situations where you feel conspicuous.
sentences.cn: 觉得自己身处众目睽睽之下时，你可能会有想哭的感觉。

words.tran_cn: 显著地，明显地；超群地，惹人注目地
显而易见；惹人注目；突出

phrases.tran_cn: 显然缺席；因缺席而引人注目
